channel.title: Hugging Face Posts
channel.description: This is a website scraping RSS feed for the Hugginface trending posts.

item.title: New DeepSeek-R1-0528 1.65-bit Dynamic GGUF!
item.description: New DeepSeek-R1-0528 1.65-bit Dynamic GGUF! Run the model locally even easier! Will fit on a 192GB Macbook and run at 7 tokens/s. DeepSeek-R1-0528 GGUFs: unsloth/DeepSeek-R1-0528-GGUF Qwen3-8B DeepSeek-R1-0528 GGUFs: unsloth/DeepSeek-R1-0528-Qwen3-8B-GGUF And read our Guide: https://docs.unsloth.ai/basics/deepseek-r1-0528 See translation

item.title: ğŸ§ We just implemented Andrej Karpathy's "third paradigm" for LLM learning!
item.description: ğŸ§ We just implemented Andrej Karpathy's "third paradigm" for LLM learning! System Prompt Learning (SPL) enables LLMs to automatically learn problem-solving strategies from experience, rather than relying on static prompts. ğŸš€ How it works: Your LLM builds a database of effective strategies, selects the best ones for each problem, and refines them over time based on success rates. ğŸ“Š Results across math benchmarks: Arena Hard: 29% â†’ 37.6% (+8.6%) AIME24: 23.33% â†’ 30% (+6.67%) OptILLMBench: 61% â†’ 65% (+4%) The best part? All strategies are human-readable and the system gets progressively better at problem types you use frequently. âœ¨ Key benefits: ğŸ”„ Cumulative learning over time ğŸ“– Transparent, inspectable strategies ğŸ”Œ Works with any OpenAI-compatible API âš¡ Simple integration: just add "spl-" prefix to your model Built as an open-source plugin in optillm. After 500 queries, our system developed 129 strategies and refined 97 of them! This feels like a genuine step toward AI that learns...

item.title: ğŸš€ NEW DROP: run your own on-device LLMâ€”in minutes, on any phone
item.description: ğŸš€ NEW DROP: run your own on-device LLMâ€”in minutes, on any phone Today weâ€™re open-sourcing everything you need to put Qwen3-0.6B straight into a production-ready mobile app: ğŸ¥ Watch Qwen3-0.6B chat in real time on any smartphones! ğŸ“Š TPS benchmarks â€“ slides comparing token-per-second across heterogeneous mobile devices ğŸ’» Plug-and-play source â€“ Just Copy & Run the source to your project for Android (Kotlin & Java) and iOS (Swift). ğŸ¤ Cross-platform, one pipeline â€“ ZETIC.MLange auto-tunes kernels for every different devices, weâ€™ve tested. ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Ready for production â€“ swap in your own model, re-benchmark with one command, publish. Get started Just Sign-up and check the playground project, QWEN-0.6B - https://mlange.zetic.ai/p/zetic-example/Qwen3-0.6B We built this to show that cloud-free LLMs are ready today. Dive in, fork it, and tag ZETIC.ai when you launch your own on-device assistant, game NPC, or offline content generatorâ€”weâ€™ll spotlight the best projects. See translation

item.title: I built an AI Website: ai-garden.netlify.app
item.description: I built an AI Website: ai-garden.netlify.app It is a curated garden of AI resources. It's my database for writing and research, organized by category and designed for quick access. Whether you're looking for learning materials, development tools, research papers, or industry news, everything's laid out in a clean, searchable format. Feel free to suggest new resources or improvements - this garden grows better with community input. ğŸ» See translation

item.title: Hey! I built RAG MCP Server Space, a simple Gradio MCP server for RAG systems that allows you to search relevant results without passing huge contexts to your LLM.
item.description: Hey! I built RAG MCP Server Space, a simple Gradio MCP server for RAG systems that allows you to search relevant results without passing huge contexts to your LLM. You can use this space to integrate with your agents and improve the efficiency of your search results. Feel free to try it out and let me know if you have any feedback or questions! frascuchon/rag-mcp-server Thanks for checking it out! See translation

item.title: The AI Memory Layer Will Change Everything â€¼ï¸
item.description: The AI Memory Layer Will Change Everything â€¼ï¸ Why do even the smartest AIs like OpenAI's o3 and GPT-4o, Google's Gemini and Anthropic's Claude forget? In this blog we unpack this challenge and explore how building a real memory into AI will redefine personalization and agent capabilities! https://fullstackagents.substack.com/p/forget-me-not-the-ai-memory-layer See translation

item.title: May highlights from Chinaâ€™s open source ecosystem ğŸ”¥
item.description: May highlights from Chinaâ€™s open source ecosystem ğŸ”¥ zh-ai-community/may-2025-open-works-from-the-chinese-community-681a3494145f2914dc679b7c âœ¨ DeepSeek dropped R1 updates - Both R1 & 8B distralled smol model âœ¨ Bytedance goes big on open source: - BAGEL, Dolphin, Seedcoder, Dream0... âœ¨ Multimodal is on fire! - HuyuanCustom / HunyuanVideo-Avatar / HunyuanPortrait - MiniMax: SynLogic / Orsta-7B - Xiaomi: MiMo VL - Alibaba Wan: Wan2.1-VACE - OpenGVlab: ZeroGUI - StepFun: ACE-Step-v1/Step1X-3D âœ¨ Specialized models/datasets excels - Alibaba Qwen: World PM 72B - BAAI:RobotBrain (MLLM for robotic) - HiThink Research: BizFinBench (dataset) - OpenBMB: Ultra FineWeb (dataset) - Bilibili: Index-anisora (Anime/ACG) - Skywork:Matrix-Game (game) More awesome releases: Alibaba QwenLong-L1-32B, SkyWork OR1, OpenS2V-5M etc... See translation
